entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 13.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 9. POP 40%
